nanook

Class GCParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • nanook.GCParser

  • public class GCParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to parse GC content of a FASTA file for creating a GC graph.

      void parseSequence(java.lang.String fastaFilename, java.lang.String sequenceId, java.lang.String outputFilename, int binSize)

    • Method Detail

      • parseSequence

        public void parseSequence(java.lang.String fastaFilename,
                 java.lang.String sequenceId,
                 java.lang.String outputFilename,
                 int binSize)
        Parse a file looking for a particular ID and write GC content histogram data.
        Parameters:
        fastaFilename - name of FASTA file
        sequenceId - ID of sequence in file
        outputFilename - output tab separated file containing GC content per position
        binSize - bin size to use
